title: Sooooo. I found out the bad page for Diana the hard way
body:
Of course it's gonna take a while to find the right rune page for everyone but man, do NOT take Sorcery with the comet thingy into Domination and Taste of Blood thingy.

I picked Diana into Akali cause I counter her and usually wreck her with my Diana.

Not this time. Holy crap.

I couldn't trade with her, and it didn't help that the damn Ezreal jungle (he's not a jungler, peeps, get him out of there) and their support THRESH kept camping me early.

Does anyone know of a better page? Maybe Domination into Resolve or something? Cause this definitely wasn't the right one holy beep!

replies.body: considering diana is burst, why wouldn't you take the domination route and take the new thunderlords, everything else seems irrelevant on her
What about a secondary page? Resolve, Sorcery, or Inspiration? I don't know if Precision is any good but I'll fix my page for her and put Domination first.

Idk as i haven't tried anyone like diana, but i played ryze and i would assume sorcery as a second would be the best way, but test some stuff and maybe it'll be better


Edit: as far as running a quick combo/burst as she does would prob make it a same standing as ryze anyways

https://i.gyazo.com/1111f9b22025745a47ef913710ea7b00.png

I'd run something like that, most of the sorcery options (or even sorcery itself) can be switched out based on preference/match up.
Thanks! I'll try it out when I can and see how it goes.
